---
title: "cstime"
description: "Date and time functions for public health purposes"
author: "Chi Zhang, Richard Aubrey White"
date: "2022-10-25"
categories: [utility]
---

`cstime` provides convenient and consistent conversion between 

* isoyear
* isoweek
* calyear
* season week (used in influenza surveillance)


[GitHub link](https://github.com/csids/cstime)
